name: My Eggs
description:
You play as a rooster who collects scattered eggs for his hen, but there are many traps and obstacles around, and not stable weather in it will interfere with him, control the wind element and help him to get all the eggs to their destination.

My Eggs - Side-view game with a physical world, where the player by controlling the direction of the wind moves objects in the game, as well as the main character, who must collect all the eggs and deliver to the destination.

Game features:
- Visual style.
- Physics
- Difficulty
